verbs.description: [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: right] - our elections are fixed . But he 's wrong about the reasons for it .
Donald Trump is right - [ARG1: our elections] [V: are] [ARG2: fixed] . But he 's wrong about the reasons for it .
Donald Trump is right - [ARG1: our elections] are [V: fixed] . But he 's wrong about the reasons for it .
Donald Trump is right - our elections are fixed . But [ARG1: he] [V: 's] [ARG2: wrong about the reasons for it] .
